Articles.Content: No pictures in your signature? CHEATER!
Mentioning signatures to your advantage? Cheater!
Hey! You mentioned signatures yourself, you hypocritical cheater!
Being a hippocrite while mentiong a hippocrite? CHEATER!!!!!!!!!!
Forcing me to keep Jeb happy?! CHEATER!!!!
What? Blowing stuff up since 2012? Judging by your join date, i see the kraken got you, which means technically you've been blowing stuff up since 2013! Cheater! Only cheaters get dates wrong!
Advertising open positions in your company through your signature AND asking for rep? HAAAAAAAAAAX
Developing and maintaining multiple mods? Clearly cheating is more than a hobby for you, it's a passion. Real modders make one mod and promptly abandon it.
Dissmissing boosters in your signiture is clearly against the rules you cheater! You should only praise boosters or overusers of said boosteers.
Claiming to be an awesome person in your title description with only 36 posts? Uh, clearly cheating. Real players make sure everyone knows they are awesome before claiming to be so.
Using the words real and awesome in the same sentence. Clearly a cheater!
Obviously the ksp plane physics aren't accurate so therefore being a plane designer is being a CHEATER!!!

Calling someone a cheater? CHEATER!

(sorry for irony)
Bro, spamming refresh to claim page 1000 is cheating. Totally uncool.
Telling me to get out of the soup? CHEATER

Telling me to Check out Kerbal history 2 and Who's that Kerbal? Cheater! You ask too much of me, which clearly defines you as a cheating cheater cheaterpants. Non-cheaterpants never ask too much of people!
Using the word cheater to describe me as a cheating cheater who cheats, and using the words cheater cheating cheaterpants. CHEATER!
Anyone with the word "cheat" or its derivatives used so much in a single post is clearly a dirty cheater.
Irony? Cheating!
The 369th post can only be posted in by cheaters. Cheater!
Claming to reside in the "Kerbal Space Center's astronaught complex" and spelling Astronaut wrong? Cheater! Real KSP players and fans would know how to spell astronaut.

Stealing your reason for calling someone a cheater from the Banning thread? Cheaterpants with matching cheaterjacket. Good posters come up with their own original reasons for calling someone a cheater.

Wow, didn't see that. Made me laugh when i saw it two seconds ago though. (Haven't played any other forum games except stupid question stupid answer and this one for months)

However, falsely accusing me of stealing another poster's idea? That is cold hard cheating right there. Warm and snuggly non-cheaters never falsely accuse!

Wow, didn't see that. Made me laugh when i saw it two seconds ago though. (Haven't played any other forum games except stupid question stupid answer and this one for months)

However, falsely accusing me of stealing another poster's idea? That is cold hard cheating right there. Warm and snuggly non-cheaters never falsely accuse!

Not knowing that an astronaught is just a space dougnut? HAX!
Link to a tiny, tiny picture in your sig? That's the cheater's way of giving us all eyestrain. Please try to be a more awesome person by linking images visible without a microscope.
